p: All specimens were fixed in 95% ethanol for subsequent clearing in phenol-alcohol and slide mounted in phenol-balsam, following the methods of Wirth and Marston ( 1968). Culicoides species were identified with keys and illustrations by Battle and Turner ( 1971), Blanton and Wirth ( 1979), and Wirth et al. ( 1985) and by comparison with specimens in the collection of WL Grogan. Representative specimens were deposited in the Clemson University Arthropod Collection and the synoptic collection of ceratopogonids maintained by WLG at Salisbury University.
